AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shalk rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of tending to [PAWN_possessive] tribes shalk herd. This mostly involved leading the shalk from one patch of slightly burnt grass to another, though occasionally it also involved shooting at cliff racers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: kwama nest harvester
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with harvesting eggs, wax, and cuttle from [PAWN_possessive] tribes local kwama nest. Luckily the settled Dunmer had turned the nest into a mine, before abandoning it due to the growing blight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nix hound tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tamed, raised, and trained nix hounds for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. These beasts were a great asset to the tribe, being used for all sorts of tasks, such as herding guar and shalk, tracking wild animals, finding clusters of wild ash yam, and as an ingredient in the cooks stew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crafter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] created all sorts of goods for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. These ranged from necklaces and amulets, to windchimes and lanterns.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: framer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with assembling and dissembling [PAWN_pronoun] tribes tents. A task that [PAWN_nameDef] often found [PAWN_objective]self doing multiple times a week.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was [PAWN_possessive] tribes cook. Not a particularly enjoyable job, as the ingredients often lacked variety. But [PAWN_possessive] tribe members never seemed to mind, or at least never voiced their complaints.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was [PAWN_possessive] tribes cook. Not a particularly enjoyable job, as the ingredients often lacked variety, and [PAWN_possessive] tribe members often voiced their distaste of being fed cliff racer stew again.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tea brewer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days brewing tea for [PAWN_possessive] tribe members. As [PAWN_possessive] tribe was forced to live in the ashlands, there wasn't exactly a great wealth of plant life to brew tea from. So [PAWN_nameDef] was usually forced to brew trama root and bittergreen tea yet again.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tanner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted and repaired clothes and yurts for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_nameDef] always sighed when the hunters bought [PAWN_possessive] cliff racer leather, which was most of the time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: heath tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] would help [PAWN_possessive[ tribe members with all sorts of tasks, from cooking meals, to crafting arrows, and occasionally even building new yurts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wise-woman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was [PAWN_possessive] tribes Wise-Woman, a role passed down by [PAWN_possessive] mother. [PAWN_nameDef] was an integral part of [PAWN_possessive] tribe, arguably more important than even the Ashkhan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of [PAWN_possessive] tribes healers. Many days were spent curing illnesses, patching wounds, and searching for medicinal plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well trained warrior, and helped ensure [PAWN_possessive] tribe was safe from any who sought them harm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: champion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Highly skilled with both spears and blades, [PAWN_nameDef] was not someone you wanted to see on the battlefield.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] day digging away at rock, in search of anything remotely useful for the tribe. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] found Resdayn glass, sometimes ebony, and occasionally even a kwama nest.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ash yam farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was quite a skilled farmer, and spent much of the day tending to [PAWN_possessive] ash yams. It was always tough leaving [PAWN_possessive] yams behind when the tribe moved, but such is life in the ashlands.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gatherer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] would often go out into the ashlands in search of edible plants. A rather difficult task, as the fauna of the ashlands is quite aggressive. Even a guar is willing to defend its ash yams

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of [PAWN_possessive] tribes hunters. Tracking animals in the ashen wastes was hard work, but [PAWN_nameDef] always managed to find something.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sentry
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was incredibly proficient with a bow, even with minimal training. [PAWN_nameDef] helped to keep [PAWN_pronoun] tribe safe from numerous threats, though most of them were cliff racers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While ashlanders generally distrust foreigners, some tribes did allow trade with them. [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to one of those tribes, and specialised in bartering for goods that [PAWN_possessive] tribe needed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ashkhan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the Ashkhan of [PAWN_possessive] tribe, a role earned through blood and sweat, and a role that [PAWN_nameDef] did not easily give up.
